Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'All the Corrupted are drawn to it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "This massive thing... It's a combat customized agricultural heavy machine, I know these well...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Righto, I mean just look at it! If we didn't need it to get out, I'd want to try wrestling with it!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If it's just fighting with pure strength, Kamui might be able to win.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Really?! That just makes me want to wrestle with it more!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The main hall has the highest Corrupted density...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, and the commotion from the fight will certainly draw the Corrupted from both sides toward it as well.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Both sides? Then we're in luck! Let's just run away in the meantime!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Wait... I think there's one more thing we have to do first.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "You sure, Lucia? Such an opportunity isn't likely to come again...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's a structurally simplistic machine, but it wasn't infected by the Punishing Virus. It must contain some unique technology of the estate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If we leave it, it'll be controlled by the virus eventually. And with a mechanoid of this prowess... it'll likely be trouble...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I agree with Lucia. Even if we get a chance to blow up the estate, we can't be sure that the machine will still be here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Alright, alright... I've already heard of the perfectionism of the Gray Ravens before.", 4: '1'}
